attributes.review: when i opened the app i saw this saggy looking cheeto puff and my skeleton jumped outta my skin and i had to chase it allllll around the world. only for this orange cheeto puff to put it alllll the way on the other side of his so called "great wall" then when i went to climb the wall security was like oh hell no so they kicked me to Saturn and then i met this very nice alien called hediabdjdb and he flew me back to earth so i gave him a big old hug and we walked around paris and stuff eating bread and spaghetti and then they tried to take hediabdjdb away from me😩😩😩 so i went to area 51 with hediabdjdb and we chilled there. then we escaped and now we lived peacefully at my house until i showed him the app then he had a seizure cuz the cheeto puff scared him and he died. and i still live without my skeleton to this day🥴😭👏🏼

attributes.review:
This app is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. First of all, it took two hours to download. It would constantly stop downloading, no matter if it was on WiFi or off WiFi, it just wouldn’t download. It slowed my whole phone down because of this. 
Once it finally downloaded, it constantly crashed! I was trying to educate myself and clearly the app just didn’t want that to happen. 
The worst part is that the rest of the apps on my phone are now crashing. I have an iPhone XR so it’s not an old phone. Everything is up to date, something about this app just messes with your phone. I didn’t believe all the other reviews, I thought it was just fake news. But clearly it’s real. 
I would give this app zero stars if possible. Just don’t get it.
attributes.title: Crashing

attributes.review: I have never in my life been so disappointed in an app. The app is super glitchy and poorly made. Not only do I question the credibility and experience of the people that created this app, but I also question if they were in their right mind????? Every time I clicked to open the app my phone would literally catch on fire. Not only would my phone suddenly burst into flames, but then Nickelback would start playing INCREDIBLY loud from my phone’s speakers. This would last for about 2 hours and would occur 5-10 minutes after opening the app. For my safety and everyone else’s, this app needs to be removed FOREVER. For your safety, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP. This app is a danger to my fellow Americans and America itself, and I am begging that it is taken down.
attributes.title: This is the WORST APP I HAVE EVER WASTED A CLICK ON

attributes.review: When I first logged on I was terrified!! I saw a scary orange speaking in front of me!! I throw my phone across the room thinking I was safe!! But then the world started shaking!! And then the talking orange from before came out of my phone!! It look at me and then it started running towards me!! I started running for my life to get away from it!! I thought I got away but then I heard it’s call!! I scream in fear and it heard me!! I started to run again but it god so long I need to stop!! But then I figured out how to kill it!! I pull out my phone and there he was!! We were looking into each other’s eyes!! Then he starts running full speed at me!! But when he got to close I started relegating on him!! Killing him with my amazing dance moves!! I won the war!! This is why this I a 0.5 star app!!
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: i downloaded this app excited to participate. i’m a 17 year old so i can’t vote yet, but i’m doing all i can to support our president. but when i opened the app, the setting were really weird. it asked me if i was cisgender, white, straight, christian, and male. i’m a bisexual female, but there wasn’t an option to say that. it just said “straight or not.” anyway, i clicked that i wasnt, and the app immediately called me the f slur. it then gave me a rating out of 10 and told me that flat chested girls can never be a 10. after that, a petition was shown to me that would take away my right to adopt a kid if i marry a women. so i went back and changed the settings to a white cishet christian man and what a surprise! suddenly i was part of these nice chat groups and was given this little messages of encouragement. it was weird tho, because a lot of the chat members had profile pictures of themselves in these white hoods. it was creepy. the app then figured out i lied about my identity and sent ice to my house to put me in a cage as punishment. i’m writing this from the cage right now. somebody should really make this illegal cuz it feels kinda wrong. anyway, terrible app. one star.
attributes.title: not good

attributes.review: I know exactly what you’re thinking, because I was here a first time, and it was still something I’ll never forget. Everybody wants it. The moms want it. The dads want it. The kids want it. It’s time to Download it. What they have to view, though, is if you look at the chart, and maybe Mike has it, but we looked at it before. And when you do download it seems simple. Very simple. Very easy. Then you do it and it’s bad very very bad! And a lot of people don’t know this. But it’s horrible. It’s the worst and This app is an attack on our liberty, our magnificent liberty. It must be stopped and it will be stopped very quickly. We will expose this dangerous application, protect our nation’s children from this radical assault, and preserve our beloved American way of life

attributes.title: SCAM

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of seeing things from a different perspective. Maybe Trump isn’t as bad as we believe. But right off the bat as I downloaded this app there was a knock on my door. I thought it was a weird coincidence so I went to go check it out. I opened the door and 3 men dressed in all black barged in and searched my house. They installed some sort of chip into all of my devices and wiped all of my data. I think they stole my information. Then they programmed every single device in the house to only show Trump related content. After they left they ran over my pet cat and drove away. My phone began to glitch and exploded in the palm of my hand. It was a very terrible experience. Luckily they didn’t get to my microwave which is where I am writing this review. Do NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! ❌❌❌
attributes.title: WORST APP ⚠️⚠️
